wikipedia_page.main: Fagun Thakrar is an English actress, writer-director, social entrepreneur and activist. Fagun has appeared in several British, American, and Indian cinema, receiving accolades for her performances. In her films, Fagun has starred alongside actors such as Martin Sheen, Donald Sutherland, and Brie Larson. As an activist, Fagun Thakrar is involved in many global non-profits. She supports initiatives focused on global health and holistic well-being, and subsequently founded the Creatively Inspired Life Foundation to empower young people through creativity.
